alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 545 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo Depot, or near Pueblo Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Pueblo, Pueblo Airport and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
